p: ZIKV has a predisposition to occur in any natural habitat of the Aedes mosquito vector.[ 5 26] The virus has been identified in various mosquito species namely - Aedes aegypti, Aedes albopictus, Aedes furcifer, Aedes africanus, Aedes apicoargenteus, Aedes luteocephalus, and Aedes vittatus.[ 27 28 29 30]
